modName: Free Choice of Starting Equipment - NO CHEATING
summary: Places a chest in Helgen Keep, that offers weapon of your choice, but keeps the game fair.
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever been mad about following Ralof or Hadvar, but having only one opinion - Iron Sword or War Axe? This mod fixes it. It adds a chest with Iron Weapons, Imperial Heavy Armor and Stormcloak Light Armor. There is also something for mages, like a spelltome, two scrolls and robes. The chest is placed in the second room, which you enter when following Ralof and which you pass through when following Hadvar.

The chest offers:
Weapons:
Imperial Bow
Imperial Sword
Iron Arrows (50)
Iron Battleaxe
Iron Dagger (2)
Iron Greatsword
Iron Mace
Iron Sword (2)
Iron War Axe
Iron Warhammer
Armor:
Imperial Heavy Armor Set
Stormcloak Cuirass + Fur accessories
Iron Shield
Hide Shield
Unenchanted Robe
Boots
Scrolls:
Scroll of Fireball (2)
Spell Tomes:
Spell Tome: Oakflesh
Misc.:
Torch

This mod is not a cheating mod, it just gives the player an opinion to choose a weapon, as it should be in an RPG. 

And if you have problem, that you would like to take all the things, but still keep the game fair, imagine there are only items you need ;).

A note about the spell tomes and all that:
I have just finished a pure mage playthrough and i must admit, that playing without alteration isn\'t easy. And if somebody has got a problem that the Scroll, the Spell Tome, or the Robes are in the chest, please go leave it to the topic \"Mages are N00by and Should not come close to warriors\", because this is a kind of racism, or rather classism :D and i dont allow it here.
author: Modger99
